title: Midwest Electric holds 81st annual Member Meeting
content: Midwest Electric brought in their members for their annual meeting Saturday morning in St. Marys.  The meeting involved reports from cooperative officials and results for the trustee elections, which are done online and by mail. Information was also provided for the 600 Midwest Electric members that are registered - and officials say holding meetings like this one helps everyone stay on the same page.  "Since we're member-owned, this is one of their chances to exercise their ownership - they can ask any kind of question, voice any kind of concern, they have access to top management or the board of trustees to share those concerns?," said Matt Berry, CEO of Midwest Electric.  This is the 81st annual meeting for Midwest Electric.
